name: Lazrow, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Housing Authority

judges: Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones, Chidsey, Musmanno and Aenold, JJ.
parties: Lazrow, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Housing Authority.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Levinthal for the court below.
Decree affirmed at the appellant’s costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Frank B. Murdoch, with him Gilbert W. Oswald and William A. Schnader, for appellant.
Howard E. Stern, with him Milton G. Sharp, for Redevelopment Authority of City of Philadelphia, amicus curiae.
casebody.head_matter:
Lazrow, Appellant, v. Philadelphia Housing Authority.
Argued November 23, 1953.
Before Steen, C. J., Steaene, Jones, Chidsey, Musmanno and Aenold, JJ.
Frank B. Murdoch, with him Gilbert W. Oswald and William A. Schnader, for appellant.
George E. Peterson, for appellee.
Howard E. Stern, with him Milton G. Sharp, for Redevelopment Authority of City of Philadelphia, amicus curiae.
January 4, 1954:
